decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, ES6, Replacement UDP PolicY 4.1. | The flat roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, , in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, ES6, H33, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.9. | The extension permitted shall not be used or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 80 Eastcote Avenue, Greenford.  REASON:	To ensure that the character of the area is preserved and a separate dwelling is not created, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, H11, H8, H26, T50, T63, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5, 5.6, 5.9, 9.1, 9.11.
description: Single storey extension to front of house in conjunction with conversion of garage into habitable room
